desc:
Click Combo: LEFT-RIGHT-RIGHT
Shoots a long-ranged arrow that explodes and deals high damage over a large area. (Self-damage for 10% of your DPS)
Mana Cost: 45
Total Damage: 160% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 140%)
 (Fire: 20%)
Range: Â±26 Blocks
Area of Effect: 4.5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Improve your Main Attack's damage and range when using a bow. </br> Main Attack Damage: +5% </br>Main Attack Range: +6 Blocks
Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Bomb. </br> Mana Cost: -10

Hitting a mob directly with Arrow Bomb, will shatter its heart and deal additional damage.

Total Damage: +100% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +100%)
Doubles Main Attack arrows and reduces their damage. (Harder to hit distant enemies) </br> Main Attack Damage: -40% (per arrow)
Click Combo: LEFT-LEFT-LEFT </br> Throw yourself backward to avoid danger. (Hold shift while escaping to cancel) </br> Mana Cost: 20
Your Main Attack arrows have increased speed and knockback.

Click Combo: LEFT-RIGHT-LEFT
Shoots a stream of 8 arrows, dealing significant damage to close mobs and pushing them away.
Mana Cost: 35
Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS, per arrow)
 (Damage: 30%)
 (Thunder: 10%)
Range: Â±16 Blocks
Reduce the Mana cost of Escape by 5.

Click Combo: LEFT-LEFT-RIGHT
Forms a shield around you that slightly reduces the damage you take. Being hit will consume one charge of the shield. Enemies that get too close will take damage and be knocked away. (3 charges)
Mana Cost: 30
Total Damage: 70% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 60%)
 (Air: 10%)
Effect: 20% Resistance Bonus
Area of Effect: 2.3 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Duration: 60s
Casting Escape grants a speed buff to you and nearby players. </br> </br>Effect: +40% Speed Bonus to Allies </br>Duration: 120s </br>Area of Effect: 8 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Increase your base damage from all Air attacks. </br> </br>Air Damage: +3-4 </br>Air Damage: +15%
Increase your base damage from all Thunder attacks. </br> </br>Thunder Damage: +1-8 </br>Thunder Damage: +10%
Increase your base damage from all Fire attacks. </br> </br>Fire Damage: +3-5 </br>Fire Damage: +15%
Increase your base damage from all Water attacks. </br> </br>Water Damage: +2-4 </br>Water Damage: +15%
Increase your base damage from all Earth attacks. </br> </br>Earth Damage: +2-4 </br>Earth Damage: +20%

Doubles the speed of Arrow Storm and shoots +6 arrows per stream.

Total Damage: -10% (of your DPS, per arrow)
 (Damage: -5%)
 (Thunder: -5%)

When Arrow Shield loses its last charge, spew 75 piercing arrows forth from your bow.

Total Damage: 4% (of your DPS, per arrow)
 (Damage: 3%)
 (Air: 1%)

Hitting an enemy with Arrow Storm will create an area of effect that slows them down and deals damage every 0.4s.

Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 30%)
 (Earth: 10%)
Effect: 40% Slowness to Enemies
Duration: 5s
Area of Effect: 2 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

Arrow Bomb will leave a trail of fire for 6s. Enemies that walk into it take damage every 0.4s.

Total Damage: 50% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 30%)
 (Fire: 20%)
Duration: 6s
Cooldown: 3s

Condense Arrow Storm into a single ray that damages enemies 10 times per second.
Mana Cost: -5
Total Damage: 30% (of your DPS, per hit)
 (Damage: 25%)
 (Water: 5%)
Range: 16 Blocks
Duration: 1.2s
Triples Main Attack arrows but they deal -10% of normal Main Attack arrow damage. </br> Main Attack Damage: -10%
Hitting an enemy will give you a brief buff of +3% Walk Speed. (Max +70%) -5% of the bonus decays every second.

Your Arrow Shield turns into 2 sentient bows that fire at nearby enemies every 0.45s, each with 10 ammunition. (Arrow Shield will no longer push enemies away or provide resistance)

Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS, per shot)
 (Damage: 30%)
 (Air: 10%)
Range: 6 Blocks
Duration: 60s

When you hit the ground with Arrow Bomb, leave a Trap that damages enemies. (Max 2 Traps)

Total Damage: 250% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 210%)
 (Earth: 20%)
 (Fire: 20%)
Range: 2 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Area of Effect: 7 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
When hitting an aggressive enemy 5+ blocks away, gain +1 Focus. (Max 3) (Lose 50% Focus if you miss once) </br> Damage Bonus: +15% (per focus) </br>Cooldown: 1s

Arrow Storm will shoot +1 stream of arrows and +2 extra arrows per stream.
Arrow Storm gains recoil while midair.

Total Damage: -10% (of your DPS, per arrow)
 (Damage: -9%)
 (Thunder: -3%)
 (Air: +2%)
Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Storm by 5.

Arrow Bomb pulls enemies towards you. If a Trap is nearby, it will pull them towards it instead. Increases Heart Shatter's damage.

Total Damage: +40% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +40%)
Gives Arrow Shield +2 extra charges. Guardian Angels will deal -40% damage.
Your Traps will deal +20% more damage for every second it's active. (Max +100%) </br> Increase your maximum Traps by +1.

When casting Escape, throw a hook that pulls you when hitting a block. (Escape will not throw you backward anymore) </br> Holding Shift while casting will pull any enemy you hit. </br> </br>Range: 30 Blocks
Increase your maximum Focus by +2.
Phantom Ray gains extra forward range, and becomes wider. </br> </br>Range: +8 Blocks </br>Area of Effect: +0.2 Blocks
Windy Feet will last longer and grant a stronger speed buff. </br> </br>Effect: +60% Speed Bonus to Allies </br>Duration: +60s

For every 16 arrows shot by Arrow Storm, your Main Attacks will additionally fire a flint arrow that damages enemies. (Max 5)

Total Damage: 25% (Main Attack Damage, per arrow)
 (Damage: 25%)
Duration: 6s

Arrow Shield summons a Hound that will attack aggressive enemies every 0.25s and drag them towards your traps.

Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 40%)
Vision: 18 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Duration: 60s
Leap forwards when you double jump. The distance scales with your Walk Speed. </br> </br>Cooldown: 4s
For every 1% Walk Speed you have from items, gain +1 Raw Spell Damage (Max 100)
Arrow Bomb will bounce once when hitting a block or enemy.

Bryophyte Roots summons a Snake after disappearing that will spit weakening venom at aggressive enemies every 1s. (Max 1) Enemies will be weakened for 1.5s.

Total Damage: 100% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 80%)
 (Earth: 20%)
Effects: -15% Damage Bonus to Enemies
Vision: 12 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Duration: 18s

If you have 2+ Focus, holding shift will summon Twain's Arc. Charge it up to shoot a destructive long-range beam.

Total Damage: 300% (Main Attack Damage)
 (Damage: 300%)
Range: 48 Blocks
Arrow Bomb's recoil is increased, and its self-damage is reduced to 1%.

Fire Creep becomes much stronger.

Total Damage: +15% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +10%)
 (Fire: +5%)
Duration: +2s
Increase your maximum Traps by +3.

Guardian Angels gain +8 additional ammunition. Whenever you cast a spell, your Guardian Angels become briefly empowered. </br> Casting Arrow Storm will cause them to shoot 2.25x faster. </br> </br>Duration: 0.9s </br> Casting Arrow Bomb will cause them to shoot explosive shots, dealing +20% damage. </br> </br>Area of Effect: 3 Blocks (Circle-Shaped) </br>Duration: 3s

When using Escape, hold shift to quickly drop down to deal damage and blind enemies.

Total Damage: 250% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 250%)
Area of Effect: 6 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Effect: Blindness to Enemies
Duration: 1s
Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Shield by 5.

Arrow Shield's radius, knockback, and damage is increased.
Guardian Angels' damage is increased.

Total Damage: +30% (of your DPS, for Arrow Shield)
 (Damage: +30%)
Area of Effect: +1 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

Total Damage: +15% (of your DPS, for Guardian Angels, per shot)
 (Damage: +15%)

Arrow Bomb will be unaffected by gravity and increase its explosion damage.

Total Damage: +40% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +20%)
 (Thunder: +20%)
Reduce Leap's cooldown by 2s.
Your Main Attack arrows will follow nearby enemies and will be unaffected by gravity.
Your Traps will give you 0.5 Mana per second and 10 Mana when they explode. </br> Increase your maximum Traps by +1. </br> Mana Cost: +10 </br>Range: 16 Blocks
Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Storm. </br> Mana Cost: -5
If you do not damage an enemy for 4s or more, your next successful hit will deal +60% damage and add +1 Focus.

Increase Guardian Angels' range and damage.
Casting Arrow Shield while Guardian Angels are active will also cast Buckshot. Increase Buckshot's damage.

Total Damage: +25% (of your DPS, for Guardian Angels, per shot)
 (Damage: +20%)
 (Fire: +5%)
Range: +3 Blocks

Total Damage: +3% (of your DPS, for Buckshot, per arrow)
 (Damage: +3%)

When casting Escape, release a cluster bomb mid-air that explodes, sending a payload of 150 arrows to your previous location. (Each enemy can only be hit by one arrow)

Total Damage: 350% (of your DPS, per arrow)
 (Damage: 300%)
 (Thunder: 50%)
Cooldown: 4s

Basaltic Trap summons a Crow upon detonation that will peck at aggressive enemies every 0.9s. (Max 2) Damaged enemies will be distracted for 0.2s.

Total Damage: 60% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 60%)
Effect: Blindness to Enemies
Vision: 18 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Duration: 12s
Phantom Ray will increase its damage by 15% every time you do not miss with it. (Max 90%) </br> Phantom Ray gains extra forward range. </br> </br>Range: +8 Blocks
Slow Falling is applied upon using Escape. Crouching at any point will cancel this effect. </br> </br>Duration: 5s

Twain's Arc charges 25% faster, and can now pierce through up to 5 enemies, dealing reduced damage after piercing. (Damage is dealt as Main Attack Damage)

Total Damage: -150% (after piercing)
 (Damage: -150%)
When any of your projectiles miss, gain +0.1 Mana.

Arrow Bomb's explosion will fling 25 shrapnel, dealing damage in a large area. (Each enemy can only be hit by one shrapnel)

Total Damage: 250% (of your DPS, per shrapnel)
 (Damage: 200%)
 (Earth: 50%)
Reduce the Mana cost of Escape. </br> Mana Cost: -5
Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Shield. </br> Mana Cost: -5
Increases your Grappling Hook's range, speed and strength. </br> </br>Range: +8 Blocks
Shocking Bomb will temporarily shock enemies, reducing their defences. </br> </br>Effect: -15% Resistance Bonus to Enemies </br>Duration: 4s </br>Cooldown: 10s
Arrow Storm will shoot +2 extra streams of arrows. </br> Arrow Storm's recoil is doubled.

Your Traps will be connected by a rope that deals damage to enemies every 0.2s.
Increase your maximum Traps by +1.

Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 20%)
 (Air: 20%)

Increase your maximum Snakes by +1. Increase your maximum Crows by +2. Increase the damage of your Hound.

Total Damage: +40% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +40%)

If you have 5+ Focus, casting Arrow Storm while 4+ blocks above the ground will cause you to levitate and shoot 20 homing arrows per second until you run out of Focus.
While in this state, lose 1 Focus every 0.5s.

Total Damage: 120% (of your DPS, per arrow)
 (Damage: 90%)
 (Water: 30%)

Attach an icy snare to Basaltic Trap, drastically inhibiting and damaging nearby enemies every 0.2s after it detonates.
Increase your maximum Traps by +1.

Total Damage: 50% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 40%)
 (Water: 10%)
Effects: 10% Slowness to Enemies, per hit (Max 90%)
Duration: 5s
Area of Effect: 7 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Cooldown: 12s

Arrow Bomb and Grape Bomb become much hotter, increasing the damage of their explosion.

Total Damage: 150% (of your DPS, for Arrow Bomb)
 (Damage: 120%)
 (Fire: 30%)

Total Damage: 60% (of your DPS, for Grape Bomb)
 (Damage: 45%)
 (Fire: 15%)
Patient Hunter will increase its damage by +10% per second, and increase its Max Damage by +100%. </br> Increase your maximum Traps by +1.
Enemies near you will be slowed down. </br> </br>Effect: 30% Slowness to Enemies </br>Range: 3 Blocks
Increase your maximum Focus by +2.
While airborne after casting Escape, your next 3 Main Attacks can be fired in quick succession regardless of attack speed, and will instantly fire from Twain's Arc. </br> </br>Cooldown: 6s

Arrow Bomb will throw 3 additional smaller bombs when exploding.

Total Damage: 80% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 60%)
 (Fire: 20%)
Area of Effect: 2 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Bomb. </br> Mana Cost: -5
